title: All game uploads restored!
body:
Finally I’ve finished importing of markable.in data to WordPress format and now you can find all my repacks either in

A-Z list
or by using search (which is cool and searches as you type 🙂

 
 

 
 

Some things left to do:

  • Replace all small 1-thumb screens with 6-screens blocks
  • Create the “Repacks Troubleshooting” page, with pics and maybe videos

If you find any error in game posts (like missing screens, covers or links) – leave a comment in there, I’ll take a look.

Like the video excerpt above? Then watch this (subtitles included)!
